abilities.name: Healing Brew
abilities.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 7 range for 196 Health.

abilities.name: Cloud Serpent
abilities.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies for 25 damage per attack. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Wind
abilities.description: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 140 damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 2 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

heroics.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
heroics.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies within 10 range, restoring 1632 Health over 6 seconds.

heroics.name: Water Dragon
heroics.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.
